thread.title: A special year, a special bond for two brothers
thread.title_full: A special year, a special bond for two brothers

title: A special year, a special bond for two brothers
text:
A special year, a special bond for Palmetto Ridge senior and his brother Andrew Sodergren 4:52 PM, Oct 23, 2015 5 hours ago Previous Next 
On the back practice fields at Palmetto Ridge, a father and son take in some football action. 
An umbrella shields the young man, confined to a wheelchair and unable to walk or talk. The father, Kevin Miller, thoroughly enjoys the beautiful afternoon with two of his sons. 
Offensive lineman Steven Miller has helped Palmetto Ridge to its finest start in school history, with the previously unbeaten Bears sporting a 6-1 record after Friday nightâ€™s loss to Naples. 
The Golden Gate Estates resident has dedicated his senior year to his 20-year-old brother Daniel, who has a severe form of cerebral palsy. 
Full story available to subscribers only.
